author: Lukas Hochmuth
description: A floral aperitif cocktail awakened by a spritz of champagne.
name: White Americano
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)
15 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
15 ml Brut champagne or sparkling wine

recipeInstructions.text: STIR first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
